useCase.name: Adding a new Edge Agent with selected authorizations

preconditions.precondition: Alice has chosen existing or add new device from options in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in the Provision New Agent diagram.

mainSequence.step: Edge Agent 2 provides instructions for adding Agent 2 and selecting authorizations.
Alice adds an agent with selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays provisioning code for adding Agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Edge Agent 1.
Edge Agent 1 notes the code for adding agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 scans the code from Agent 1.
Edge Agent 2 sends add request, A-pk, Avk, token data, and claims to Edge Agent 1.
Edge Agent 1 stores Avk in the wallet.
Edge Agent 1 confirms Agent 2 to Alice.
Alice confirms Agent 2 to Edge Agent 1.
Edge Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to the policy registry.
Edge Agent 2 receives ALS, token data, and claims from Agent 1.
Edge Agent 2 stores the data in the wallet.
